btrplace.solver.choco.constraint

Class ConstraintMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.solver.choco.constraint.ConstraintMapper

  • public class ConstraintMapper
extends Object
    Mapper that allow to convert SatConstraint and OptConstraint to ChocoConstraint.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConstraintMapper()
      Make a new empty mapper.

        public static ConstraintMapper newBundle()
        Make a new ConstraintMapper and fulfill it using a default mapper for each bundled constraint.
        Returns:
        a fulfilled mapper.

      • register

        public boolean register(ChocoConstraintBuilder ccb)
        Register a constraint builder.
        Parameters:
        ccb - the builder to register
        Returns:
        true if no builder previously registered for the given constraint was deleted

      • unRegister

        public boolean unRegister(Class<? extends Constraint> c)
        Un-register the builder associated to a given Constraint.
        Parameters:
        c - the class of the Constraint to un-register
        Returns:
        true if a builder was registered

      • isRegistered

        public boolean isRegistered(Class<? extends Constraint> c)
        Check if a ChocoConstraintBuilder is registered for a given Constraint.
        Parameters:
        c - the constraint to check
        Returns:
        true iff a builder is registered

      • getBuilder

        public ChocoConstraintBuilder getBuilder(Class<? extends Constraint> c)
        Get the builder associated to a Constraint.
        Parameters:
        c - the constraint
        Returns:
        the associated builder if exists. null otherwise

      • map

        public ChocoConstraint map(Constraint c)
        Map the given Constraint to a ChocoConstraint if possible.
        Parameters:
        c - the constraint to map
        Returns:
        the mapping result or null if no ChocoConstraint was available
